member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "http://filetransfer.test.nordea.com/services/CorporateFileService"). Note that test environment is available only when Corporate eGateway service is used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". When testing against production, this has to be "TEST" or the files will be processed as actual production files.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.TargetId
member.summary: Optional. The logical folder name where the file(s) of the customer are stored in the bank. A user can have access to several folders.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "http://filetransfer.test.nordea.com/services/CorporateFileService"). Note that test environment is available only when Corporate eGateway service is used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". When testing against production, this has to be "TEST" or the files will be processed as actual production files.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.FileReference
member.summary: File reference id to be downloaded (e.g. "123456").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.FileEncoding
member.summary: Encoding of the file to be download, if empty UTF8 will be used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.FileType
member.summary: File type to download (e.g. "pain.001.001.02").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.TargetId
member.summary: The logical folder name where the file(s) of the customer are stored in the bank. A user can have access to several folders.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.Status
member.summary: Optional parameter Status can be used to filter filelist. Valid values for files are "NEW" or "DOWNLOADED" (NEW = files not downloaded yet. DLD = files already downloaded). If no parameter is given or if the status is "ALL", all files will be listed.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "http://filetransfer.test.nordea.com/services/CorporateFileService"). Note that test environment is available only when Corporate eGateway service is used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". When testing against production, this has to be "TEST" or the files will be processed as actual production files.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileInput
member.summary: File input.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileType
member.summary: File type to upload (e.g. "pain.001.001.02").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.FileEncoding
member.summary: Destination file encoding, if empty UTF8 will be used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.TargetId
member.summary: The logical folder name where the file(s) of the customer are stored in the bank. A user can have access to several folders.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.Url
member.summary: Url of the web service (e.g. "http://filetransfer.test.nordea.com/services/CorporateFileService"). Note that test environment is available only when Corporate eGateway service is used.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.CertificateIssuedBy
member.summary: The issuer of the X509Certificate2 certificate object to used for signing web service calls. First matching certificate is used. An Exception is thrown if a certificate is not found or it has already expired.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.Environment
member.summary: Environment to be used for the web service. Valid values are "TEST" or "PRODUCTION". When testing against production, this has to be "TEST" or the files will be processed as actual production files.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.CustomerId
member.summary: Customer Id number. The certificate needs to be assigned to the same customer id (e.g. "1234567890").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.RequestId
member.summary: Request Id is the web service call id number which needs to be unique for at least 3 months.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.FileType
member.summary: Mandatory FileType is used to filter filelist. Files with specific FileType will be returned (e.g. "pain.001.001.02").

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.TargetId
member.summary: The logical folder name where the file(s) of the customer are stored in the bank. A user can have access to several folders.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.StartDate
member.summary: Optional parameter StartDate can be used to filter filelist. Files created after this will be returned (inclusive). If this value is null, or unparseable to a DateTime object, no filter is applied.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.EndDate
member.summary: Optional parameter EndDate can be used to filter filelist. Files created before this will be returned (inclusive). If this value is null, or unparseable to a DateTime object, no filter is applied.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.Status
member.summary: Optional parameter Status can be used to filter filelist. Valid values for files are "NEW" or "DOWNLOADED" (NEW = files not downloaded yet. DLD = files already downloaded). If no parameter is given or if the status is "ALL", all files will be listed.

member.name: P:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput.ConnectionTimeOutSeconds
member.summary: Timeout in seconds to be used for the connection and operation.

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.WebServices.GetUserInfo(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.GetUserInfoInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetches user info from the web service. In case of an error an exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.WebServices.DownloadFileList(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.FileListInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: DownloadFileList fetches a filelist from the web service. Files can be filtered with different parameters: FileType, StartDate, EndDate or Status. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
member.returns: JToken array. Properties: FileReference, TargetId, ParentFileReference, FileType, FileTimestamp, Status

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.WebServices.UploadFile(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.UploadFileInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Uploads a file to the web service. File type needs to be specified for the file. File content is compressed by GZIP. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
member.returns: JToken. Properties: FileReference, TargetId, ParentFileReference, FileType, FileTimestamp, Status

member.name: M:Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.WebServices.DownloadFile(Frends.Community.PaymentServices.Nordea.Definitions.DownloadFileInput,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Downloads a file from web service. In case of an error an exception is thrown.
